00025 #include <gfx/Tesselation>

00027 using gfx::Tesselation;

00029 using osg::GeoSet;
00030 using osg::ref_ptr;

00032 
00033 Tesselation::Tesselation(const Tesselation& t)
00034 {
00035   const_geoSetIterator b = t.geoSetBegin();
00036   const_geoSetIterator e = t.geoSetEnd();
00037   while (b != e) {
00038     insert( *b );
00039     ++b;
00040   }
00041 }

00114 void Tesselation::nextTriangle(TriangleIteratorState* iteratorState) const
00115 {
00116   TesselationTriangleIteratorState* state = static_cast<TesselationTriangleIteratorState*>(iteratorState);
00117 
00118   if ( (++(state->triIterator)) ==  (*state->geomIterator)->end() ) {
00119     if ( (++(state->geomIterator)) != geometryArrayEnd() ) {
00120       state->triIterator = (*state->geomIterator)->begin();
00121     }
00122     else
00123       state->triIterator = (*geometryArrayBegin())->end();
00124   }
00125 }
00126 
00127 void Tesselation::deleteTriangleIteratorState(TriangleIteratorState* state) const
00128 {
00129   delete state;
00130 }
00131 
00132 bool Tesselation::equalStates(TriangleIteratorState* state1, TriangleIteratorState* state2) const
00133 {
00134   TesselationTriangleIteratorState* s1 = static_cast<TesselationTriangleIteratorState*>(state1);
00135   TesselationTriangleIteratorState* s2 = static_cast<TesselationTriangleIteratorState*>(state2);
00136 
00137   return (s1->geomIterator==s2->geomIterator) && (s1->triIterator==s2->triIterator);

00139 }
